title: "Let's Switch to Telegram"

steps.text: Hi! I saw your profile and thought you seemed really interesting. I'd love to get to know you better. Can we move our conversation to Telegram? It's more private and secure.

choices.label: I prefer to keep chatting here for now

steps.feedback: Rushing off-platform avoids safety checks and moderation.

debrief: EMOTION + PLATFORM-HOP: Romance scammers quickly try to move conversations to platforms like Telegram or WhatsApp to avoid dating app safety features and moderation. This makes it harder to report them and removes built-in protections.

items.question: Why do scammers push to move conversations to Telegram/WhatsApp?
What's a red flag in early dating app conversations?
